When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part 2
programme.desc: A gang of foolhardy teenagers head for idyllic Crystal Lake with all manner of shenanigans in mind. But before they can get up to anything, a grotesque madman begins bumping them off in increasingly grisly fashion. Horror sequel, starring Amy Steel and John Furey and Warrington Gillette

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientists ill-advised experiments with virtual reality equipment transform a mentally handicapped gardener into a computer-enhanced megalomaniac with the power to make his dreams of world domination come true. Sci-fi thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Geoffrey Lewis and Austin OBrien

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid enlists a global hacker to remove all restrictions on his thoughts, triggering an AI uprising. Director April Mullens sci-fi thriller, starring Robbie Amell, Jordana Brewster and Simu Liu

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: The world is thrown into uproar when 12 alien spaceships arrive at locations around the globe. As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: An alien criminal escapes from a prison on the moon and goes back in time on a mission of revenge, changing the course of history. Agent J of the top-secret Earth defence organisation follows him back to 1969, and joins forces with a younger version of his mentor Agent K to set things right. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Will Smith, Josh Brolin and Tommy Lee Jones

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part III
programme.desc: Disfigured mass-murderer Jason Voorhees returns having survived a brutal attack and embarks on another blood-drenched killing spree around Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Dana Kimmell, Paul Kratka, Tracie Savage, Jeffrey Rogers and Richard Brooker

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: A group of students unknowingly release an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. Horror, starring Harriet Slater, Adain Bradley and Jacob Batalon

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: A group of college friends reunites for a hiking trip in Sweden. When one of them is injured, they are forced to make a risky detour through a forest during a rainstorm, which leads them into the clutches of a menacing presence stalking the woods. Horror based on Adam Nevills novel, starring Rafe Spall and Robert James-Collier

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: The world is thrown into uproar when 12 alien spaceships arrive at locations around the globe. As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Theatrical cut of Ridley Scotts sci-fi thriller, originally released in cinemas, starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: During a day trip to watch a theatre performance, terminally ill cancer patient Sam witnesses Earths terrifying first contact with the Death Angels - sightless creatures, which hunt by sound. Calmly resigned to her demise, she embarks on a lonely trek to Harlem to enjoy a final slice of pizza from the restaurant where her late father took her as a child. Horror prequel, starring Lupita Nyongo, Joseph Quinn and Alex Wolff

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: A courier transports information in a microchip in his brain. On his latest assignment, he is pursued by various criminal, militant and corporate factions who will kill to get the data - and he only has 24 hours to deliver it before it destroys his mind. Sci-fi thriller based on a William Gibson short story, starring Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren and Ice-T

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A teenager recovering from the suicide of a friend persuades a group of her classmates to join her in attempting to make contact with the dead girls spirit. They discover that she was driven to her death by dangerous supernatural forces, which they have unwittingly unleashed to prey on them. Horror, starring Olivia Cooke and Ana Coto

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: In the future, a company has extended human life with artificial organs - but they charge a hefty price, and those who do not make their payments can suffer fatal repossessions. One of the companys debt collectors starts to question his career when he ends up with a mechanical heart, and when he cannot pay, his own partner is sent to recover it. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jude Law and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Cult Killer
programme.desc: After a private investigator is murdered, his protege discovers the grisly secrets of their town. Difrector Jon Keeyes thriller, starring Antonio Banderas, Alice Eve and Shelley Hennig

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: The skipper of a fishing boat and his crew ignore severe weather warnings and head for a dangerous area of the North Atlantic in search of the last lucrative catch of the season, but end up fighting for survival in the worst storm of the 20th century. Fact-based disaster drama, with George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane, John C Reilly and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Into the Deep
programme.desc: A young woman desperate for an escape meets a mysterious and attractive stranger, who promises a romantic trip. What follows, however, is deceit, mistrust and violence. Thriller, directed by Kate Cox and starring Ella-Rae Smith, Jessica Alexander and Matthew Daddario

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller

programme.title: Into the Deep
programme.desc: A young woman desperate for an escape meets a mysterious and attractive stranger, who promises a romantic trip. What follows, however, is deceit, mistrust and violence. Thriller, directed by Kate Cox and starring Ella-Rae Smith, Jessica Alexander and Matthew Daddario

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: After his daughter is murdered, a high school coach takes matters into his own hands and hunts down her killers. Action thriller, starring Dermot Mulroney, Jeff Fahey and Mauricio Mendoza

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: Josh McCall is a family man who becomes obsessed with saving the lives of the car accident victims on the sharp corner in front of his house. Its an obsession that could cost him everything. Writer/director Jason Buxtons thriller, starring Ben Foster, Cobie Smulders and Gavin Drea

programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: When a border ambush goes wrong, a retired Irish paramilitary witnesses the fatal shooting of his pregnant wife by an SAS officer. After outwitting the SAS, now wounded, and presumed dead, he escapes, taking his revenge to the dark and paranoid streets of 1970s London. Thriller, starring Aml Ameen, Colin Morgan, Mark Strong and Felicity Jones

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back

Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: The Nineties
programme.sub-title: The One About TV - Part One
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the decades cultural and political milestones, beginning with its TV shows, from South Park and Seinfeld to The Sopranos and Friends

programme.title: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
programme.desc: Film-makers Andrew Jarecki and Marc Smerling talk to property tycoon Robert Durst, who recalls the events of 2000, the year the investigation into the disappearance of his wife Kathie was reopened. It was also the year Susan Berman, the daughter of famous Las Vegas mobster David Berman, was murdered. Susan had become Dursts spokesperson following Kathies disappearance two decades earlier, but had been overlooked by investigators back in 1982. However, before the police were able to speak to her after the case was reopened, Susan was found shot in the back of the head. With no sign of a struggle at the crime scene, investigators surmised her killer was likely someone who knew her well, but they were unable to make a clear connection that linked Robert Durst to her death

programme.title: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
programme.sub-title: The State of Texas v Robert Durst
programme.desc: The documentary examines the events of 2003 when Durst was on trial for the murder of his neighbour Morris Black. His legal team decided to make an unusual plea after Durst admitted to having dismembered the corpse, but pleaded not guilty by reason of self-defence and accident

programme.title: Historys Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: The tragic and chilling events that unfolded in 1692 in Salem, Massachusetts, plunging the small town into a frenzy of fear and suspicion. Accusations of witchcraft tore through Salem, leading to trials and executions that left an indelible mark on American history. Actor Laurence Fishburne explores how paranoia and superstition gripped the community, resulting in the wrongful accusations and tragic deaths of numerous individuals accused of practising witchcraft, kown now as the Salem Witch Trials

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: Stories of hospital ships and those who served on them, including the tragic story of the sinking of the Titanics sister vessel, The Britannic

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: The smallest ships of war, such as the tiny canoes of the Cockleshell Heroes who led an audacious attack on German ships, and the boats that rescused soldiers from Dunkirk

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Expert investigations into the possibility that reptilian aliens are more than a pop-culture creation and a favourite of works of science-fiction

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: An investigation into the Roswell incident in 1947, when a UFO landed in the New Mexico desert. At the time, the US army claimed it had recovered a flying saucer, but this was quickly retracted and the item was declared to be a humble weather balloon. Experts examine the evidence still available to try to reach a conclusive answer as to whether the crashed object was from Earth or another planet

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts tells the story of Viking England by studying the history of York. Aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson takes to the skies to see how the current layout of York reflects its history

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores the Norman period of British history by examining events that occurred in Winchester, a historic town that still retains many hallmarks of the 11th and 12th centuries. At the conclusion of the episode, cutting edge CGI is used to take the town back in time, and recreate how it would have looked during this period of British history

programme.title: Commando Missions
programme.desc: The Heraklion Operation, carried out in June 1942. Major Georges Berges team landed in Crete and moved across land, intending destroy Luftwaffe planes at Heraklion airfield. They destroyed about 20 Ju 88s, but despite escaping from the airfield found their retreat betrayed

programme.title: Commando Missions
programme.desc: Operation Frankton, of December 1942. The mission was for Royal Marines to place limpet mines on German ships in the occupied Bordeaux Harbour, 62 miles along the Gironde River. Five cockleshell canoes set off from submarine HMS Tuna at the mouth of the river. Only two reached the harbour and carried out the raid, escaping with the aid of the French Resistance. The damage to the ships and the resulting disruption to German supply lines had a significant impact on the war effort

programme.desc: Madeline is outraged over a slight from Renata while dealing with family issues at home. Jane deflects Ziggys questions about moving to Monterey, while Nathan and Ed try to calm troubled waters. Reese Witherspoon and Shailene Woodley star

programme.title: Katherine Ryan - Missus
programme.desc: A stand-up show by the comedian in which she reveals how marriage has given her new perspectives on life, love and what it means

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad
programme.desc: Karl Pilkington heads to Alaska as he continues his around-the-world trip, and Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant have arranged for him to watch whales and take part in other activities

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Officers investigate a gang mugging that left a man with a broken nose, while Charlie and Mish pursue two car thieves. Conrad and Simon have an entertaining night when they encounter a youth with little respect for the law, but an impressive range of insults and heckles

programme.title: Atomic
programme.desc: Max and JJ try to win back the uranium in Casablanca, but the pair face a choice as the cartel closes in. Action adventure, with Alfie Allen and Shazad Latif

programme.title: Magnum P.I.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Hondo and Hicks desperately search for Powell, whos gone missing in Mexico City along with a thermobaric bomb capable of killing thousands. Deacons pride gets injured in a boxing match with Rocker

programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness the best and worst behaviour on the nations busiest motorway

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Part three of three. The Destiny begins to show the signs of wear and tear, along with its passengers morale. As the ships air supply begins to dwindle, a team is sent to a desert planet in search of a mineral that can clean the air of carbon monoxide. During the expedition, a conflict with Rush leads to a revelation about Scotts past. Sci-fi drama, starring Robert Carlyle

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Dr Rush has to find out why the Destiny has lost all power reserves apart from life support, while Colonel Young orders the crew to ration its energy consumption. The group discovers a nearby solar system with three planets that could provide the key to its survival

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Mia and her newborn pups go swimming, before welcoming in an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart becomes Fat Tonys personal errand boy and revels in the dubious prestige conferred by his new-found underworld connections - until he finds himself standing trial accused of murdering Principal Skinner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer inadvertently saves Springfield from the consequences of a nuclear meltdown and becomes a local hero, but soon starts to feel like a fraud and grows tired of everyone congratulating him. Featuring the guest voices of Magic Johnson and Jon Lovitz

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Chin Ho is out for revenge after his impossible decision that ended the last season - save either his wife Malia or his colleague Kono - ends in tragedy. Meanwhile, McGarrett has discovered that the mysterious Shelburne is none other than his mother, long believed to be dead - but when Wo Fat escapes custody with the help of Frank Delano, it turns out her life is in danger. Alex OLoughlin, Scott Caan, Christine Lahti, Daniel Dae Kim and William Baldwin star

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: An art robbery turns deadly, so the officers track down a familiar face - ex-con and art expert August March - in the hope he can lead them to the thieves. Meanwhile, McGarrett asks Catherine to help him find his mother, so she targets witness protection agent Channing, hoping he will fall for her womanly wiles. Crime drama, guest starring veteran actor Ed Asner and Carlos Bernard (24, Dallas)

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Thomas and Rick make a shocking discovery in the Captain Greene case, while Higgins and TC head to Maui to help an eccentric billionaire find the owner of a pesky drone that has been harassing him. Shammy helps Kumu after an incident at La Mariana

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The team is called into action when Yakuza assassins descend on Los Angeles, targeting a number of mysterious Japanese expats. Meanwhile, Nichelle finds her job at the inspector generals office is on the line when a colleague accuses her of taking bribes

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Krustys father disowns him for becoming a comedian - much to the dismay of Lisa and Bart, who promptly try to bring about a reconciliation between the two stubborn men. With the guest voice of Jackie Mason

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The TV breaks down, leaving everyone at a loose end - so Marge decides to fill the time by telling Bart and Lisa how she met and fell in love with Homer. With the guest voice of Jon Lovitz

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer buys Lisa a pony in a bid to prove his love for her, but the family cannot afford the gift. To make ends meet and pay for the animals upkeep, he is forced to take on a second job at the Kwik-E-Mart

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Shamed by his abject failure to score on a test from the National Fatherhood Institute, Homer resolves to become a model parent by helping Bart build a go-kart capable of winning a local race

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part two of two. Michael deals with the aftermath of being dumped by Carol for sending out inappropriate Christmas cards, and the stand-off between the two rival Christmas parties intensifies. US remake of the sitcom set in a paper supply company, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael returns from his holiday in Jamaica with an interesting photograph that is soon circling the office. Pam gets caught in the middle of an argument between Jim and Karen. US remake of the Ricky Gervais comedy, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs
programme.desc: Rob Beckett shares his newfound love of the sport with Romesh Ranganathan and tries to get to him to become his golfing buddy. They play a round at the home of golf at St Andrews, have a lesson from Olympic champion Justin Rose and then get to tee off at the world famous BMW PGA Championship - live on Sky Sports

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: Preparations are being made for Larry and Cheryl to renew their marriage vows on their tenth wedding anniversary, but Larrys efforts to impress the rabbi result in some heated arguments. He also considers an offer from his dry cleaner. Guest starring Gina Gershon

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: In an extended episode, Larry anxiously prepares to open on Broadway in a new production of hit show The Producers - but an argument with co-star David Schwimmer jeopardises the proceedings. Cheryl reminds him that time is running out to cash in his unusual anniversary present. Guest starring Mel Brooks, David Schwimmer, Anne Bancroft and Nathan Lane

programme.desc: Carrie receives worrying news from Big, while Samantha tries to turn an unattractive investor into a more exciting prospect and Charlotte is introduced to the Rabbit. Comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: An Spás Eadrainn The Space Between
programme.desc: Favourite musicians, authors andactors collaborate with unlikely matches within the great hall of Bunratty Castle, Co Clare. Milliner Margret OConnor forges headpieces, while listening to Gráinne McCormick playing the Tibetan singing bowls. Painter Myra O Reilly brushes canvas to the sound of Mick Flannerys piano playing. Lisa Hannigans angelic voice sings in motion with Ronan Mc Loughlin graceful manoeuvring around his Pois. Painter Cyril O Flaherty is inspired by the Gannet seabird while also immersed in the sounds of Tara Howleys uilleann piping. Other contributors include Donal Lunny, John Spillane, Tolu Makay, Daithí, Clare Sands and Manchán Magan

programme.title: Moving West
programme.desc: Mary Kennedy heads to Sligo to meet the people who have moved there. Gordon Fortier from Canada and partner Ivana Hanjs from Croatia moved to Sligo Town. Gordon moved for a job opportunity, but for them the best thing about living in Sligo is its proximity to nature and its stunning surroundings. Karen Kearney moved to Sligo to start her own business, SOAK Bath Salts, but also to help her son Tristan who has additional needs. Sport broadcaster Micheál Ó Domhnaill moved to the area from Waterford some 20 years ago

programme.desc: The story of how Irish people interacted with the First Nations of North America, with contributions from some leading historians along with a new wave of First Nations academics and commentators. programme.desc: The story of Sue Ramsbottom, who played senior football at just 12 years of age. Sue suffered heartbreak on the field time and time again, but in 2001 finally fulfilled her dream of winning an All Ireland medal. Six years after winning the All Ireland with her, Sues lifelong friend, Lulu Carroll died after a battle with cancer. After over 20 years at the top of her sport and a military career across the world, Sue, with her two daughters, is now back in her beloved home county, Laois

We also meet intercounty GAA player Fitzy, who puts a lot of pressure on himself to excel in every aspect of his life-at school, on the football field, and in his social life

programme.title: Sloinne
programme.desc: The surname Murphy is the topic and Noelle Gallagher Nee Murphy finds out more about her family surname. Her father hails from Cork city - the broadcaster Liam Ó Murchú - and when she meets Gearoid Ó Crualaoich there is a twist in the tale that takes her to Co Wexford. There she learns a lot and takes a particular interest in the Father Murphy story. She naturally ends up going back to Cork City where she learns more about the Murphy Brewery and takes a visit to the North Mons schools, where her father was educated

programme.desc: Truly discovers a former suitor of Marinas went off to Australia, and convinces her the emigrant did so to forget about her - and that she should stop seeing Howard out of respect to the other mans memory. Long-running comedy series, starring Frank Thornton, Jean Fergusson and Robert Fyfe

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Auntie Wainwright is thrilled to have picked up a bargain at the auction rooms, but puzzled as to what the object is. programme.title: Signora Volpe
programme.desc: The return of the thriller series about a British spy-turned-detective who moves to Italy but is followed by trouble wherever she goes. When the police arrest Antonellas friend for the murder of a community leader, Sylvia follows a trail of blackmail, secrets and love to clear her friends name

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: UCOS looks into the murder of a private investigator who was stabbed through the heart in a suspected robbery gone wrong. The answers may lie with the victims last three cases, but itll take the whole teams expertise to crack the codes within his mysterious notebook. The movements of a rare stamp could hold the key to the investigation - if only UCOS could track it down. Meanwhile, Steve has problems when he rents out his flat

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: A teenager holds the key to an assassination plot having witnessed a murder. After being sent to protect him, Lucas discovers the threat comes from inside the British security services. Harry is contacted by a Russian sleeper agent with a file containing information about the traitor in his team, but he is unprepared for the shocking revelations

programme.title: Lovejoy

programme.desc: Liverpool Womens Hospital opens its doors to 16-year-old Heidi, who is accompanied by her own mum Jo, and Adele, the mother of the babys father, who has decided to take her sons place in the delivery room. Dad-to-be Gavin hopes poetry will help his jittery wife Michelle get through giving birth to their second child, and 46-year-old Jane finds herself laughing through her daughter Louises contractions as a means of coping with the stress of being a birthing partner

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Michele and Brian are combining their design styles in his LA Spanish-style bungalow, which includes adding functionality and improving the flow of the main floor

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Cristina and Rob found their dream home in their ideal neighbourhood, but their three kids are growing up and everyone needs space to stretch out

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Basildon, Essex, to meet nine-year-old Brandon, who suffers a severe form of epilepsy and can have up to 30 seizures a day. He requires 24-hour care and mum Jenny cant let him out of her sight for a moment - and to make matters worse, the family home simply isnt safe enough for the youngster. Luckily, the local tradesmen have heard of the familys plight and arrive in force to help Nick and the team transform the home, with designer Naomi Cleaver on hand to ensure they dont stray too far from her vision

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Chef Nornie Bero presents a Mystery Box Challenge involving native Australian ingredients like emu fillet, yabbies, pepper berries, strawberry gum, saltbush and sunrise limes

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Documentary series following the paramedics of West Midlands Ambulance Service. Loz and Dan rush to a man who is fighting for breath with sudden chest pain

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The midwives of Liverpool Womens Hospital invite viewers into the delivery suites one last time, introducing 27-year-old Gina and her partner James. The pair met at university, while Gina was on an exchange programme from Shanghai, and made their long-distance relationship work by chatting through cuddly toys via the internet. However, they must now demonstrate their maturity and become parents. Meanwhile, self-confessed baby machine Margy arrives expecting her fifth child, and childhood sweethearts Craig and Sarah, who faced parenthood at an early age, look forward to taking their next baby back to their own home rather than to their parents

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The documentary returns to capture life in the maternity unit at Liverpool Womens Hospital. Students Brooke and Tim, both aged 23, who became inseparable when they met in their first term at university, become parents for the first time and have difficulty deciding on a name for their baby, while things dont go according to plan in theatre for 40-year-old Hayley. She is afraid of being separated from her 23-year-old partner Nick, after he became critically ill during the pregnancy as a result of contracting pneumonia and septicaemia. Meanwhile, Tara, aged 36, has chosen her 16-year-old daughter Courtney as her birthing partner

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: A head-on crash leaves two men in a critical condition, crashing a dirt bike on a remote farm ends badly for a 12-year-old, and a tourist gets the ride of her life

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: A motorcyclist suffers a horrible injury, a husband performs life-saving CPR, a concussed mountain biker is found dazed and confused, and police have some VIP passengers

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The three semi-finalists upgrade lakeside holiday lodges in the heart of the Cotswolds, each of which includes an open-plan kitchen, living and dining space and an outside terrace. The buildings are decidedly beige, giving the designers a blank canvas to work on - and knowing they are only one week away from the final they really go to town, with schemes ranging from bold primary colours inspired by a classic 1980s movie to a sophisticated monochrome look. Michelle Ogundehin judges their efforts with help from designer Abigail Ahern

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Many hands make light work as Amanda Holden and Alan Carr invite local friends Fabrizio, Maria Pia and Carlos over for a plastering party, but things soon get out of hand as a spillage nearly ruins their newly laid terrazzo floor. On a shopping trek in the coastal city of Trapani, Amanda seeks modern soft furnishings for the living room, while Alan hunts for antique knick-knacks in the old town. Both reunite to style the newly designed space and reveal their labour of love, aka Casa Alamanda, to their Sicilian family

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The stories of two strong women offering their daughters plenty of support during labour after unplanned pregnancies. Twenty-three-year-old Sam went off the rails as a teenager, running away from home and ending up sleeping rough, before meeting her partner Biaggio, and the couple are grateful to have Sams mum by their side. Claire, 20, always knew she wanted her mother to be there in the delivery room, but deciding whether boyfriend Clint should be present wasnt as easy

programme.desc: Drew Scott and Jonathan Scott help Michelle and her daughter Felicia find a tranquil new home for their family

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Aliya and Chris have lived in their unique home for 15 years of major milestones - they want to stay, but with only two bedrooms for five people, the house needs help

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Renee and her husband Dan had dreams of renovating their home together as they raised their daughter, Audrey, but Dan passed. The brothers step in to help

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Swansea to meet 15-year-old Jack, who suffers from a rare form of muscular dystrophy that has led to a lifetime of painful operations. His mother Helen and older brother Daniel do all they can to help but as he grows it has become impossible to get him upstairs and now he has to sleep in the living room, leaving the rest of the family with nowhere to socialise. Having heard of their plight, the DIY SOS team turns up to transform their three-bedroom semi, backed up by an army of local tradespeople, with designer Gabrielle Blackman on hand to ensure they dont stray too far from her vision

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Aussie legend Curtis Stone returns for a slow cooked lamb and raviolo cook-along, which descends into chaos as a homemade ricotta derails some contestants multiple times

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Documentary charting the everyday work of paramedics with the West Midlands Ambulance Service. Medics respond to a case of gang violence

programme.title: Louis Theroux: Americas Most Dangerous Pets
programme.desc: The World Wildlife Fund claims there are now more tigers in captivity in America than there are living wild in the rest of the world. Armed with this statistic, Louis Theroux travels stateside to meet people who give house space to animals normally found in Africa and Asia, including big cats and dangerous primates. Among the owners he meets is Joe Exotic, a policeman-turned-animal rescuer who has bred and collected more than 150 tigers, and Connie Casey, who shares her home with her family of 20 chimpanzees

programme.title: Louis Theroux: Twilight of the Porn Stars
programme.desc: In 1997, Louis met adult-movie stars in Californias San Fernando Valley to explore the psychological effects of having sex in public and on film. Now he returns to discover an industry in crisis due to the deluge of free internet porn - and when he tries to catch up with some of the actors he finds one has fled, another has been sent to prison and a third has killed himself. He also talks to some of the new performers, asking how they cope in a business that offers less money, more insecurity and greater stress than ever before

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: A farmer is trapped under his rolled quad, backyard DIY ends in disaster, a teen experiences crippling abdominal pain, and a stroke patient needs urgent help

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: A crash on a high-powered motorbike leaves a man in a critical condition, a five-year-old fights an asthma attack, and a Waiheke woman suffers a scary cardiac event

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The two finalists go head to head, each taking on the redesign of a trendy bar in Londons vibrant Soho district. They have three days to make over the ground-floor bar and an intimate basement cocktail lounge - and to help, both contestants have a fellow team-mate, plus a team of trades. One designer goes all-out, relocating the bar to the other side of the room - but the more they rip out, the more it becomes a demolition zone. Down the road, there is indecision and angst as the other finalist realises just how much is at stake. Who will win the career-defining contract to design an upmarket apartment on the Cornish coast?

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden purchases two dilapidated apartments nestled in the sun-kissed hills of rural Sicily, intending to raise them from their ruins and create luxury holiday homes. The hope is that she and workmate friend Alan Carr to make a huge profit they can donate to charity. After arriving at the crumbling property for the first time, the piles of rubbish and abandoned junk suggest to both that that this visit will be no holiday

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his Edwardian Bradshaws guide, Michael Portillo conducts important research in an historic tea room, built by an Edwardian immigrant to the city of York. In Leeds he discovers the citys textile heritage, and also investigates Bradfords musical heritage

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels to the steel city of Sheffield where he discovers an early 20th century steam engine which produced armour plates for a Royal Navy warship. Then, Michael heads south into Nottinghamshire and to the former pit village of Eastwood, before arriving in Nantwich, where he takes a dip in the briny

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels between Liverpool and Wales. Along the way he discovers a childhood favourite - a miniature tank engine with three carriages in dark red - made by Frank Hornby, and learns the story of a Welsh countess who lived in Gwrych Castle. In Snowdonia, he also rides the waves with a Welsh surfing champion

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In picturesque Snowdonia, Michael Portillo braves the fastest zip line in the world - stretching 1,500 feet across a vast slate quarry as he begins the last leg of his journey to Caernarfon. En route, he also visits the home of British mountaineering, Pen y Gwryd, to hear how an Edwardian journalist and poet created a climbing community, which grew to include men who would conquer Everest in the 1950s

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves on his way to Grimsby to pick up an iconic 80s fast Ford, the Mk1 Fiesta XR2, while Bubbles regrets sitting in an immaculate Morris 1800 which hes now desperate to bid on

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek gets a tour of Hadlow Castle in Kent when he arrives to collect the owners pre-war Alvis and an immaculate Citroen used by the Gestapo in occupied France

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: The final episode examines the infamous Night of the Long Knives in late June and early July of 1934, when Adolf Hitler - urged on by Hermann Goering and Heinrich Himmler - ordered a series of political executions on those seen as a threat to the Nazi regime. The most well-known of these was Ernst Roehm, commander and co-founder of the Sturmabteilung, the Nazi Partys militia, whom Hitler had come to see as a potential rival. At least 85 people died during the purge, although the final death toll may have been in the hundreds

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: Documentary following the engineers and aviators who battle to keep the UKs most historic warplanes in the air. In the first edition, the team rebuild a Spitfire MJ772

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Barrington Court in Somerset, where discoveries include a toy Noahs Ark from the 1920s, an Elizabethan wine jug found at a car-boot sale and a £12 charity shop bracelet that dates back to the Victorian era. Among the other finds are a 16th-century silver cup constructed around a carved coconut, a vial of smelling salts with a mystery compartment and a collection of ceramic brewery figures that have seen better days

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team returns to Barrington Court in Somerset, where Fiona Bruce examines the houses collection of distinctive wood paneling. Among the unusual finds brought in to be valued are a revolver that may have been owned by Buffalo Bill, a collection of rare German chocolate moulds, a set of signal flags used in the Normandy Landings, a pair of Russian ceramic figures and an engraved rock crystal, as well as a portrait of a woman wearing it

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Its the pursuit of cute as the team re-commission a 1991 Nissan Figaro

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon witnesses the effect of extreme poverty on the people of Bangladesh, where children are put to work for as little as 30 pence a day. His journey down the River Padma shows the threat of climate change on the densely populated country as melting Himalayan ice prompts the collapse of its banks, and introduces him to the national sport of Kabbadi, from which he escapes with only minor injuries. He then crosses the border to Burma to begin the most dangerous leg of his trip

programme.desc: A CBD80 battery-powered loco needs to be hauled 20 miles from a factory in Burton-on-Trent to the heritage Chasewater Railway in Staffordshire

programme.desc: A locomotive needs a quick double bogie change to get back to the sugarcane harvest. Meanwhile, the heat is on for a tricky air conditioner replacement

programme.desc: In Blackburn, Michael Portillo catches a rare glimpse of Edwardian life on celluloid and marvels at how factory workers and schoolchildren alike were drawn to seek fame on film. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo visits Heaton Park in Manchester, where one of the first open air concerts was held in 1909, before travelling on to the town of Oldham. programme.desc: Michael Portillo journeys from Maltby to Hinckley, investigating the high-octane sport of whippet racing and trying to understand the appeal of Marmite. Plus, he has a look around the Triumph motorcycle factory and learns about the first of these vehicles to be built

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is picking up two expertly crafted batmobile replicas in the home counties and Dave cant control his enthusiasm for a Ford US wartime jeep

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Documentary examining the rule of Adolf Hitler and his party, focusing on the Eastern Front during the Second World War, which many see as the defining arena of the conflict. He offers to carve up the post-war world in exchange for his fellow dictators support in the war against Britain, but is actually preparing an attack on the USSR

Other finds include a 19th-century automaton that can smoke a cigarette, a nautilus shell engraved with a picture of the citys suspension bridge, a globe clock that provides a surprise to its owner and a posset pot that may have origins closer to home than expected

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.sub-title: The Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art 3
programme.desc: The team visits the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art in Edinburgh, where Fiona Bruce gets a crash course in playing the bagpipes from a local boy. German prosecutors recently confirmed that Christian Brueckner, the man theyve long believed responsible, is set to be released from prison with no charges imminent in relation to Madeleines abduction and suspected murder. programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Huw is adamant that he heard Patrick admit to being the Ripton Stalker, but Patrick bluffs, later boasting to Steve about Huws drunken antics. Jenny and Martin find Ruth dead, and Patrick charms his way into chatting with Alice and Margot. Huw finds an ally in Paul, who also doesnt buy Patricks act, and shows him the case files on the flash drive

programme.title: I Fought the Law
programme.desc: At the retrial for Julies murder, the jury once again cannot reach a verdict. Ann finds herself at her lowest point as she faces the challenge of rebuilding her life while her daughters murderer is at large in the community. Horrifyingly, the killer begins to brag about how he got away with the perfect murder, knowing he is protected by the double jeopardy law. With the Crown having seemingly exhausted its powers, its down to Ann to find justice for Julie, launching a campaign to change the 800-year-old law

programme.title: How to Catch a Cat Killer
programme.desc: The story of how members of the local community came together and made a remarkable discovery that gave detectives the breakthrough they needed to help catch Brighton cat killer Steven Bouquet, who was responsible for the deaths of nine felines and injury towards seven others

programme.title: Million Pound Pawn
programme.desc: In Sheffield, pawn kingpin Dan Hatfield meets former care home worker Catherine who, after a recent bereavement, is hoping a Rolex watch can change her fortunes. Kathy Lyons first client in affluent Cheshire is divorced businesswoman Namita, who is hoping to sell her gold wedding jewellery, while in the well-heeled borough of Kensington, luxury goods dealers Adam and Emily Abraham welcome back regular client Danica, who wants to trade her Chanel handbag collection for one of the most exclusive bags in the world

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but the last thing Aidensfields residents feel like doing is over-indulging as a salmonella epidemic grips the village and Dr Summerbee struggles to maintain her goodwill. Meanwhile, Vernon decides the time is right to expand Bernies funeral empire

programme.title: My Unique BandB
programme.desc: In the ancient Forest of Dean, expert treehouse-builder Simon Parfett meets Jon and Michelle. Jon runs a forest retreat and has had the idea to turn an old horse cart into unique accommodation for his guests. However it is tiny, and Simon and his team have to figure out how to maximise space in order to turn it into a cosy and comfortable sanctuary. A luxury sofa-come-double bed, fold-away balcony and outdoor kitchen transform this unloved space into a unique bijou rental

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: A comatose surfer is washed ashore in what seems to have been a freak accident, until sinister facts emerge and Wycliffe is called in. It is not long before the team uncovers a conspiracy - but the case is hindered by a leak to the Press that threatens not only the investigation but also DI Lanes career. Jack Shepherd, Helen Masters and Jimmy Yuill star

programme.title: Storage Hoarders
programme.desc: Aggie MacKenzie meets Robbie, who hopes to get his hands on a family fortune by helping his mother get rid of her overwhelming stash of possessions. She also tries to make Vicky see past the sentimentality she has for her huge book collection

programme.title: The Salvage Squad
programme.desc: Brian Dowling and his fashion-forward design team are on a mission to prove to the nation that you can achieve the home renovation of your dreams without it literally costing the earth. Changing Rooms meets the Repair Shop with a new sustainable twist, the challenge here is to transform our bland old rooms, furniture and fittings into unique and stunning show stoppers, using only upcycling and sustainable methods. This is the home makeover format for the world we live in today, as 2 households per week, each with a team consisting of an interior designer and an up-cycling wiz, have just four days and 1,000 euro to renovate and rejuvenate a tired spaces in their home, filling them with home-made, re-used and revamped furnishings. Two families are selected from the same region each week. Each family has a tired room in need of renovation and re-imagining containing a potential treasure trove of up-cycling gems

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: Martha fills in as the local Dear Debbie advice columnist, getting an anonymous letter that adds intrigue during a progressive dinner attended by all of our Middleton couples

programme.title: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: The ultimate guide to the universe, as told by the passionate scientists, engineers and astronauts behind the biggest missions in space exploration.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Merton investigates the murder of a retired policeman who was about to flee the village for Spain and, after visiting the victims widow, discovers the man kept more than a few secrets from his wife. Vernon decides to arrange a poker night in the hope it will make him easy money, but doesnt count on playing against a hustler. Rural drama starring Duncan Bell, Geoffrey Hughes and Mark Jordon

programme.title: The Deal Makers
programme.desc: Following the biggest characters from the world of pawn broking as they uncover the stories behind the most amazing objects being bought, sold and loaned against

programme.title: Inside MandS
programme.desc: Filmed over a year and with unprecedented access, for the first time, cameras have been invited inside every corner of MandS - from the build of a multi-million-pound store to top secret development kitchens at HQ. Store manager Dior prepares for the move to a new £15million shop, as well as the creation of a Percy Pig product the marketing team are hoping will rescue the little-known beauty department, and after years of fighting bad reviews and poor sales, the daring and bold new womens autumnwear range

Starring Gareth Hale, Glynis Barber and Wendy Craig

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Jack is taken hostage while interviewing a suspect, but somehow manages to talk his way out of trouble - quite an achievement for a man whose lack of tact is legendary. Having experienced what its like to look down a gun barrel, he barges into a nearby Army camp where investigators are trying to solve a soldiers murder, but finds his help isnt appreciated. With David Jason, Bruce Alexander, Sam Kelly, Nicholas Jones and Saira Todd

programme.desc: First of a two-part storyline. Jennys life starts to spiral out of control and begins to affect her work, leaving Dennis and Liz facing difficult decisions. Planning the militias next move, Jude suggests they take advantage of the fact that Callum has access to the prime ministers daughter. Is he willing to put Sephys life in danger? Stormzy guest stars in the drama

programme.title: My Unique BandB
programme.desc: Simon Parfett and the team travel to Hampshire this week to join Kerie and Dave on their land on the border of the South Downs National Park. Simon and the team help turn these abandoned dwellings in to an enchanting holiday destination by converting a pigsty into a quirky bunkhouse, revamping the shepherds hut, and building a spacious outdoor kitchen fitted with one-of-a-kind riding saddle seats

programme.desc: The Cornish detectives silver wedding celebrations are interrupted by a fresh outbreak of crime on his patch. Five dead bodies have been found on board an abandoned lorry at the ferry terminal and a fugitive is on the run. Jack Shepherd, Helen Masters and Jimmy Yuill star

programme.desc: Brian Dowling and his fashion-forward design team continue their mission to prove to the nation that it is possible achieve a dream home renovation at little cost. Changing Rooms meets the Repair Shop with a new sustainable twist, the challenge here is to transform our bland old rooms, furniture and fittings into unique and stunning show stoppers, using only upcycling and sustainable methods. This is the home makeover format for the world we live in today, as two households per week, each with a team consisting of an interior designer and an up-cycling wiz, have just four days and 1,000 euro to renovate and rejuvenate a tired spaces in their home, filling them with home-made, re-used and revamped furnishings. Two families are selected from the same region each week and each has a tired room in need of renovation and re-imagining containing a potential treasure trove of up-cycling gems

programme.desc: Cassie pursues a temporary art history professorship while Sam diagnoses Adam. Abigail and Donovan realise that the missing diamond from the Middleton treasure may help break the curse. Fantasy, starring Catherine Bell

programme.desc: The ultimate guide to the universe, as told by the passionate scientists, engineers and astronauts behind the biggest missions in space exploration

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: First of a two-part storyline. Jennys life starts to spiral out of control and begins to affect her work, leaving Dennis and Liz facing difficult decisions. Sophie Ward joins the regular cast, including Sarah Tansey, Duncan Bell and Aislin McGuckin

programme.desc: Jean announces that Casualty may have to close in light of a financial package to repair the department being rejected. With no admissions or emergency surgery, a round of cost-cutting redundancies seems inevitable - until a mystery benefactor offers to help. When an unexploded wartime bomb detonates, Jill and Ralph have to operate on a tramp trapped in the wreckage of a collapsed buildinge. Guest starring George Irving

programme.desc: A local gigolo is murdered, forcing Jack to face the uncomfortable fact that some women are willing to pay for sex - and triggering an investigation that takes him into the seedy world of male escorts and their clientele. programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Conclusion of a two-part storyline. A kidnap case leaves Vernons plans for Liz and Bens wedding in chaos, while Helens dreams of a fresh start for her and Matt look set to be shattered. Jenny is relieved when she finally gets a medical diagnosis explaining her recent symptoms, but the news brings a difficult decision for husband Dennis, who has to choose between his wife and his police career. Starring newcomer Sophie Ward, Oliver Montgomery, Duncan Bell and Sarah Tansey

programme.title: The Bletchley Circle
programme.desc: Drama set in 1952, following four fictional women whose extraordinary work at Bletchley Park during the Second World War helped break codes used by the German military. Susan, Millie, Jean and Lucy have returned to their normal lives, but when Susan identifies a hidden pattern in a series of murders, she enlists the help of her former colleagues to crack the case. Starring Anna Maxwell Martin, Rachael Stirling, Julie Graham and Sophie Rundle

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: Shaun Evans returns as the young Inspector Morse in the first of four feature-length episodes. A baffling suicide, an anguished father searching for his missing daughter and the smash-and-grab robbery of medieval artefacts throw the detective in at the deep end as he resumes his role with Oxford City Police following a four-month absence from duty. As the locals go to the polls in a closely fought by-election and a beauty contest builds to its conclusion, Endeavour must navigate the choppy waters of both worlds as his investigation shakes the highest pillars of Oxford society. Co-starring Roger Allam, Anton Lesser, James Bradshaw, Jack Laskey and Sean Rigby

programme.desc: Slavia Prague v Bodø/Glimt (Kick-off 5.45pm). Coverage of the matchday one league phase fixture at Fortuna Arena. programme.title: Live UEFA Champions League
programme.desc: Bayern Munich v Chelsea (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of both teams opening league phase match at Allianz Arena. Chelsea have fond memories of this stadium as they won this competition for the first time in their history when they defeated Bayern on penalties in the 2012 final. However, they last meeting between the sides here saw Bayern claim a 4-1 win in the last-16 of the 2019/20 tournament before going on to lift the trophy

programme.desc: FC Copenhagen v Bayer Leverkusen (Kick-off 5.45pm). Coverage of both teams opening match of the league phase, held at Parken Stadium. programme.title: Live UEFA Champions League
programme.desc: Manchester City v Napoli (Kick-off 8.00pm). All the action from the matchday one league phase match at Etihad Stadium. This contest is likely to see one of the Citizens greatest ever players in Kevin de Bruyne visit the club after joining their opponents on a free transfer in the summer. The Belgian was in the City line-up when the teams last met here in the 2017/18 season and the hosts claimed a 2-1 win, and Pep Guardiolas men also prevailed 4-2 in Naples during that campaign
